segments.text: This kitchen is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing because someone forgot to turn off the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water everywhere, ruining the cabinets and flooding the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And that woman just stands there, polishing a stupid plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got one foot in the mess and doesn't even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so clueless?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are making it worse, climbing on an unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to pull the whole thing down reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister encourages him instead of stopping this nonsense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They shouldn't be taking cookies without asking anyway.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole place is going to be soaked and broken soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one sees the danger here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's infuriating how careless everyone is being.
segments.speaker: PAR
